headline: Sempra (NYSE:SRE) Stock Dips 14% Following Revised Earnings Guidance
summary: Sempra (NYSE:SRE) has recently experienced significant developments including revised earnings guidance and an earnings announcement, aligning with broader market trends that have shown economic concerns. Despite revising its earnings guidance for 2025 and 2026, and reporting fourth-quarter sales growth, Sempra reported a decline in net income compared to the previous year. The company's diverse moves included declaring increased dividends and appointing new board members with extensive...
